scenario_text.value: Shoo! Back off, dang it!

Look...over there! Minoru’s being attacked by
Gottsumon!
What should we do, Takuma?!
(Good question...)
Save Minoru!
Run away!
Watch and wait.
Yeah, that’s what I’m talking about, Takuma!

Of course! I can’t just leave my friend to
fight those things alone!

What should we do? A single Gottsumon is one
thing, but can you take on that many?
Uhhh, I dunno...
In that case...let’s get out of here.

Good idea, Takuma. We better be careful with
these guys.

Hmm, let’s wait and see what happens.
They don’t seem to be attacking just yet...
I think you’re right. Let’s see what they do.

Besides, the Gottsumon can’t have been
chasing Minoru all this while, can they?
I wonder what happened?

It’s too dangerous to tackle something that
stony thing head-on.

Let’s look for the right time to...
Ahh shoot, another one just showed up!
Hiyaaah!
Ah, you’re...!
Are you okay, Minoru?!
That one...saved him?

Oh, I know him! That’s Falcomon!
He’s not like the bad ones!

Now do you believe me? I told you I wasn’t
your foe.

Nnngh... All right, all right, I’m sorry for
doubting you! Just help me out, please!

Understood! If you want my help, then my help
is what you shall have!
